data.persona: I joined joined the carnival.  I hope to be an acrobat.  I like moving from village to village.
data.description:
You are in the Southernmost Tower Entryway.
The rather drab tower was made of gray stones approximately all the same size. Artwork hung on the walls depicting battle scenes from long ago but even the color from these had faded with time. The cold, outside air seeped in through every small crack and crevice leaving a damp quality to the air. Sealed off rooms lined the perimeter and obviously had not been seen by human eyes for centuries.
There's a stone, a Artwork, a debris, a crack, a crevice, a tower, a wall, and a room here.
The explorer and the ghost are here.

You are carrying nothing.

The cold, outside air seeped in through every small crack and crevice leaving a damp quality to the air. Sealed off rooms lined the perimeter and obviously had not been seen by human eyes for centuries.",
            "extra_desc": "This tower was the first built to accompany the castle and was majestic in its heyday. It stood four stories tall, gleaming white with parapets on the top. The Southernmost Tower served as the guest quarters for visitors to the castle and was talked about throughout the land. After the Heinous Wars the castle was left to rot when its inhabitants fled for their lives. The castle and its accompanying tower stand as a footnote in history now.",

data.short_motivation: I have been possessed by the ghost and have no choice but to do his bidding.
data.mid_motivation: I must steal the painting that this spirit is attached to and carry it with me to the ghost's former home, or else the ghost won't be able to leave the tower.
data.long_motivation: I must hang the painting in the former home of the ghost, allowing the ghost to haunt the people who murdered him and stole his home.

timeline.label: 4 hours ago
timeline.action: go the carnival and perform acrobatics.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: go the southernmost tower entryway to admire the artwork.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: follow the ghost after noticing the explorer and become possessed by him. The ghost tells me to...

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: steal the painting of the ghost's family from the explorer.

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: put the painting in a wall inside the home, allowing the ghost to inhabit the house.
